TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Italy, title = Italy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy} }

S.FORM: Italy hya' ga cyux maki' tay 42 50 N, 12 50 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 301,340 sq km (maki' tay 72ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 294,140 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 7,200 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 62,007,540. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 47.10% , lhlahuy hya' ga 31.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Rome. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 2 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Sergio Mattarella, aring ryax 3 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. ggalan pila cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Italy hya' ga cyox maki' tay 42 50 N, 12 50 E na Oco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 301,340 sq km (maki' tay 72ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 294,140 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 7,200 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 62,007,540. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 47.10% , lhlahoy hya' ga 31.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 21.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Rome. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 2 na tay mtzyo' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Sergio Mattarella, aring ryax 3 sqo byacing tay 2 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. ggalan pila cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
